articles.description: GETAFE 1-0 REAL MADRID - PETE JENSON: Unal broke the deadlock after just nine minutes and Carlo Ancelotti's side were unable to respond despite plenty of possession.
articles.content:
Real Madrid dropped in on the neighbours for New Year's and came away feeling much the worse for wear, losing 1-0 at Getafe.
Quique Sanchez Flores' side deserved their three points as the league lea… [+4471 chars]

articles.title: Senegal accuse Watford of REFUSING to release Ismaila Sarr for the Africa Cup of Nations - Daily Mail
articles.description: Senegal accused Watford of refusing to release Ismaila Sarr for AFCON. Hewas selected as a part of Senegal squad despite  being sidelined with a knee injury.
articles.content:
Senegal have threatened to call in FIFA to intervene after claiming Watford have blocked their attempts to pick Ismaila Sarr for the Africa Cup of Nations.
